title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.11 - Prescribed parking
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.11 - Prescribed parking

State Regulations

No person shall park a vehicle or permit the same to remain
halted in, at or upon any terminal or terminal highway, except at such places
and for such periods of time as may be prescribed or permitted by the
authority. In the event that a vehicle is parked or remains halted in violation
of this section, the vehicle may be removed and the owner of the vehicle will
be liable for the costs of removal and storage of the vehicle. The disposition
of abandoned vehicles will be governed by section
1224
of the Vehicle and Traffic Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
